channel.description: Recent content in Attention on Alex's wiki

item.title: Attention
item.description: Attention is the process of selectively concentrating on a discrete aspect of information, while ignoring other information. The process of paying attention to something takes away its power. Areas of research are: determining what signals or cues generate attention the effect of sensory cues and signals on sensory neurons how it’s related to other cognitive processes like working memory. Related External Links
